description: Dashboard to monitor the SolarEdge modbus output (no battery and no meter)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Frequency")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_PF")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_DC_Current")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Current")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
    and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Energy_WH")
|> spread()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Energy_WH")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inverter1"  and r["_field"] == "I_Status")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inverter1" and r["_field"] == "I_Temp")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inverter2"  and r["_field"] == "I_Status")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: -2m)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inverter2" and r["_field"] == "I_Temp")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

import "date"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Energy_WH")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)
|> timeShift(duration: ${timezone_offset})
|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      date: strings.joinStr(arr: [string(v: date.year(t: r._time)), string(v: date.month(t: r._time)), string(v: date.monthDay(t: r._time))], v: "-")
}))
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Power")
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "site", "sn", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Power")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "site", "sn", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
    and r["_field"] == "I_AC_PF")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_AC_VoltageAB")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "slave_id"])

from(bucket: "${dynamicbucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] =~ /inverter[0-9]+/
      and r["_field"] == "I_Temp")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggType"] != "max" and r["aggType"] != "min")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "slave_id"])

list.definition:
includebuckets = /solaredge.*/
excludebuckets = /solaredge_cloud.*/

// Assumption: all buckets contain the whole time range, just with a different aggregation interval (and retention policy)
buckets()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ includebuckets and r.name !~ excludebuckets)
    |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({r with
            //replace retentionpolicy infinity with a high number in NS
            retentionPeriod: if r.retentionPeriod == 0 then
                999999999999999999
else
                r.retentionPeriod,
            //calculate the duration from "to" and "from" dashboard timespan and convert it to nanosecond
            DashboardDurationInNS: (${__to} - ${__from}) * 1000000,
        }),
    )
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.DashboardDurationInNS <= r.retentionPeriod)
    |> sort(columns: ["retentionPeriod"], desc: false)
    |> limit(n: 1)
    |> keep(columns: ["name"])
list.description: Dynamically select the bucket based on the time interval
list.name: dynamicbucket
list.query:
includebuckets = /solaredge.*/
excludebuckets = /solaredge_cloud.*/

// Assumption: all buckets contain the whole time range, just with a different aggregation interval (and retention policy)
buckets()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ includebuckets and r.name !~ excludebuckets)
    |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({r with
            //replace retentionpolicy infinity with a high number in NS
            retentionPeriod: if r.retentionPeriod == 0 then
                999999999999999999
else
                r.retentionPeriod,
            //calculate the duration from "to" and "from" dashboard timespan and convert it to nanosecond
            DashboardDurationInNS: (${__to} - ${__from}) * 1000000,
        }),
    )
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.DashboardDurationInNS <= r.retentionPeriod)
    |> sort(columns: ["retentionPeriod"], desc: false)
    |> limit(n: 1)
    |> keep(columns: ["name"])

list.description: The offset from UTC for your local time zone. eg: -7h or -5h30m
list.name: timezone_offset

title: SolarEdge Realtime
